--- Scattershot / Nosecone / Afterburner / Crossroads ---

Scattershot recieves the comm from Ironhide, "C, Commander Ironhide, 
we will come immediately." He shakes off his surprise, and opens a 
commlink to the other Technobots, "Technobots, Commander Ironhide has 
asked us to participate in a secret mission. We are to depart to 
these coordinates, and enter the secret entrance, as I will now 
describe." 

As soon as Scattershot says that they are to depart, Afterburner says 
anxiously to Nosecone, "I wanna kick tailpipe, dangit, I can't wait 
I'm out of here." He transforms, and tears out of the base towards 
the destination. Scattershot frowns, "Ungreatful punk... anyway, 
we'll leave now, we don't want hold up Commander Ironhide." He 
transfroms, and heads out. Nosecone transforms, and slowly exits the 
base, "Guys, don't get too far ahead of me!"

Crossroads turns around, and takes a step back, "Sunstreaker!" he 
salutes, "We were attacked by some punks, two have died," he looks 
downcast, but continues, "JetV put one of them into the CR chamber, 
which in my opinion is tacticly disadvantageous, I think we should 
drop the surviving bots off somewhere, and depart as soon as 
possible... the battle here probably will have attracted unwanted 
eyes." He says, looking up at the much taller Sunstreaker. His eyes 
widden then lower in respect as Commander Ironhide and his friend 
Hoist enter.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> After moving a pile of rocks out of the way, leaving an opening big
> enough for the robots, Hoist transforms. "We'd better see what 
caused
> that." he says, quickly moving in, Ironhide follows, but is caught 
off
> guard by Sunstreaker. "Let me go first, you can't lose your life 
over
> something minor Ironhide, plus I can do a better job anyways. The 
three
> Autobots enter the area to see the chaos the room has been reverted 
to.
> Ironhide opens a channel. "Technobots, we need your assistance." he
> calls on the silent frequency.
